alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Aransas, east central Nueces and southeastern San Patricio Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aransas Pass, or 8 miles northwest of Port Aransas, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Portland, Port Aransas, Ingleside, Aransas Pass, Ingleside On The Bay, Palm Harbor, Texas A&M University Corpus Christi, Bay Area Medical Center, Mustang Island State Park, La Palmera Mall and Corpus Christi Naval Air Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Nueces; Coastal San Patricio; Nueces Islands
